item.title: Two newly created wallets received a total of 103,700 ETH worth $388.00 million from Galaxy OTC and FalconX.On July 24, according to on-chain analyst Onchain Lens (@OnchainLens), a newly created wallet is accumulating a large amount of ETH. The wallet received 87,275 ETH worth $327.00 million from Galaxy OTC, and 16,472 ETH worth $61.43 million from FalconX. The two transactions totaled 103,747 ETH, with a total value of approximately $388.00 million. [Techflow TechFlow]

item.title: Injective Launches On-Chain Digital Asset Library, Ethereum Treasury Firm SBET Now Live On-ChainInjective Introduces On-Chain Digital Asset Treasury (DAT), SBET is Ethereum's Largest DAT and is Now Live on the Injective Chain. The SBET DAT is built using Injective's iAssets framework, which features native programmability, governance hooks, integrated liquidity, and cross-protocol composability. [Foresight News]

item.title: Celestia Foundation buys Polychain's entire remaining TIA holdings for $62.50M, will transfer to new investorsAccording to official sources, the Celestia Foundation is partnering with Polychain Capital to transfer all remaining TIA tokens held by Polychain to new investors. This month, the foundation purchased 43,451,616.09 TIA from Polychain Capital for $62.50M. To complete this transaction, Polychain will soon cancel its entire staked TIA holdings. To ensure that the foundation's financial situation is not affected, the foundation is completing the allocation of TIA with new investors. These transactions will use a rolling unlock mechanism, with the first unlock starting on August 16 and completing on November 14. [Odaily]

item.title: BlackRock Ethereum ETF's assets exceeded $10 billion in one yearReported on July 24 that according to The Block, BlackRock's Ethereum exchange-traded fund (ETF) ETHA has exceeded $10 billion in assets under management in less than a year, becoming the third ETF in history to reach this milestone within a year. Eric Balchunas, senior analyst at Bloomberg ETF, said on the X platform that ETHA's assets jumped from $5 billion to $10 billion in just 10 days, showing the strong appeal of Ethereum among institutional investors. Data shows that on July 23, the cumulative inflows of nine tradable Ethereum funds in the United States reached $8.65 billion, while ETHA had a net inflow of $325 million on the same day. Analysts predict that ETFs and Ethereum-related companies may purchase $20 billion worth of Ethereum in the next year, further boosting market demand. [PANews]

item.title:
Pyth Announces Launch of New Website, Reinforcing Vision for Global Price Data LayerPyth announces the launch of a new website, reshaping its vision for a global price data layer. Pyth believes that the acquisition of price data has always been expensive, opaque, and difficult to access, depriving users of the opportunity to build wealth fairly. Pyth aims to build a global price data layer with the advantages of low cost, anytime access, real-time efficiency, and openness and transparency, providing data from the world's top institutions and global markets to anyone with an internet connection, thereby capturing more market opportunities.
Pyth prices come directly from the source‚Äîtop exchanges, market makers, and trading firms‚Äîrather than public APIs or third-party aggregators. Data is updated in milliseconds and supports 24/7 access to all asset classes, including cryptocurrencies, stocks, foreign exchange, ETFs, and more. Furthermore, publishing data to Pyth is rewarded, further building the data layer into an open infrastructure.
It is reported that Pyth Network already supports 100+ blockchains and provides more than 1600+ real-time price data feeds. Under the vision of a "global universal price layer," Pyth Network aims to achieve on-chain pricing for everything, while possessing the advantages of decentralization, timeliness, accuracy, security, transparency, and low cost, further becoming an important force in driving the transformation of the global financial system. [Techflow]

item.title: Yi Lihua: ETH is showing strong momentum and is nearing the end of its consolidation. Don't short in a bull market.LD Capital founder Yi Lihua posted on the X platform, stating, "ETH is strongly approaching the end of its fluctuation. This was originally a huge pressure level, a position where many OGs collectively break even. In a bull market trend, no matter what negative news there is, do not short and try not to short. Adhere to the principle of trend investing." [Odaily Planet Daily News]

item.title: Two men suspected in New York cryptocurrency kidnapping torture case released on million-dollar bailTwo suspects, John Woeltz and William Duplessie, accused of kidnapping and abusing a Bitcoin investor in New York, were granted bail on Wednesday for $1.00M each. Despite facing charges that could lead to life imprisonment, the judge stated that the credibility of witnesses and discrepancies in the narratives of both sides in the case led to the decision to grant bail. Prosecutors allege that the two men subjected an Italian businessman to two weeks of violent coercion, including electric shocks, beatings, and death threats, with the aim of obtaining crypto assets. The defense claims that the so-called "victim" was not forcibly detained and submitted videos of him participating in social activities as evidence. Casa Security stated that it has tracked 30 similar incidents in the first half of 2025 alone, calling on crypto holders to strengthen their physical security. [Decrypt]

item.title: International Monetary Fund: El Salvador's strategic Bitcoin reserve fund accumulation of Bitcoin meets planned conditionsAccording to Jinshi, the International Monetary Fund stated that El Salvador's strategic Bitcoin reserve fund's accumulation of Bitcoin meets the program conditions. El Salvador's Bitcoin holdings are in line with the country's planned commitments. The total amount of Bitcoin held in the El Salvadoran government wallet remains unchanged. [Foresight News]

item.title: Kraken Announces Integration of INK Token and its Ink Layer 2 Network into Core Product SystemKraken has announced the integration of the INK token and its Ink Layer 2 network into its core product system, opening it up to global users and simultaneously including it in the Kraken Drops airdrop reward program. Officials stated that this move aims to promote the integration of on-chain infrastructure and centralized platforms, and expand scenarios such as liquidity aggregation, on-chain lending, and trading. Ink Network is a member of the Optimism "Superchain" ecosystem, and is in the same expansion system as Base, Uniswap L2, Sony Chain, etc. [TheBlock]

item.title: Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz Predicts Bitcoin To Hit $150,000¬†Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz told CNBC this week that he believes Bitcoin could reach $150,000 in the near term‚Äîdriven by strong market momentum and favorable macro conditions. JUST IN: üá∫üá∏ Galaxy Digital CEO on CNBC predicts #Bitcoin to hit $150,000 üöÄ pic.twitter.com/372in1k54y ‚ÄúYeah, listen, we‚Äôre in price discovery in a lot of these things, and $150k seems to me a decent target ,‚Äù said Novogratz during the CNBC interview. He acknowledged that there‚Äôs been resistance along the way, noting that ‚Äúwe have seen sellers that have come in, right? And so it‚Äôs not a one-directional trade, there have been some sellers that have come in and slowed things down.‚Äù Still, Novogratz believes the trend remains upward, as long as current narratives hold. ‚ÄúBut it feels like we‚Äôre destined to go higher, as long as this narrative continues,‚Äù he added. He cautioned that a shift in interest rate expectations, particularly if former President Trump were to signal strength in the economy that negates the need for rate cuts, could alter the trajectory. ‚ÄúIf Trump changes his mind, you know, and says, hey, we‚Äôve done such good work, the economy doesn‚Äôt need lower rates, that would change my thesis. But until that happens, I think we‚Äôre headed towards $150k.‚Äù This isn‚Äôt the first time Novogratz has forecasted a bullish price prediction for Bitcoin. In a June 12 CNBC interview, he stated that Bitcoin could one day replace gold and even reach $1,000,000. ‚ÄúBitcoin has become a macro asset,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs just becoming institutionalized.‚Äù JUST IN: üá∫üá∏ Galaxy Digital CEO told CNBC that Bitcoin will replace gold and go to $1,000,000 üöÄ pic.twitter.com/Tf831LBt1h Novogratz pointed to a weakening U.S. dollar, increased institutional adoption, and Bitcoin‚Äôs fixed supply of 21 million as critical components of its long-term growth . ‚ÄúThere is no more Bitcoin,‚Äù he noted. ‚ÄúThere have been more Bitcoins lost than will be mined for the rest of eternity.‚Äù He argued that Bitcoin‚Äôs scarcity, coupled with its growing role in diversified portfolios alongside gold and silver, is pushing it closer to mainstream acceptance. ‚ÄúThe bull case becomes that over time, gold slowly gets replaced by Bitcoin,‚Äù said Novogratz. ‚ÄúSo that is $1,000,000 a Bitcoin just to be where gold is.‚Äù [Galaxy Digital CEO Mike Novogratz]

item.title: glassnode: Increased WETH Lending Rates on Aave Cause stETH to DepegAccording to glassnode data, the increase in WETH lending rates on Aave has made stETH leveraged loops unprofitable, triggering the liquidation of ETH/stETH pool imbalances and causing stETH to depeg, exacerbating ETH's selling pressure. In addition, the growing validator exit queue has also increased arbitrage resistance, slowing the recovery of the peg. [Foresight News]

item.title: D-GN Announces $5.00M Pre-Seed Funding RoundCentralized AI data platform D-GN (Data Guardians Network) has announced the completion of a $5.00M Pre-Seed funding round, co-invested by droppGroup, Saudi businessman Hamoud Al-Rumayyan, and veteran crypto institution Hub Culture. D-GN uses blockchain technology for data traceability verification and pays stablecoin rewards to global contributors via USDT, emphasizing the elimination of gray content sources and low-cost data outsourcing. [Wu Blockchain]
